title: Mansour Al-Mansour
text:
Mansour Al-Mansour (<a href="Arabic">Arabic</a>:منصور المنصور) (1941 – November 9, 2011), was a <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>i actor.
Death.
Al-Mansour was on business with the Gulf Arab Theater Group when he died of <a href="pneumonia">pneumonia</a> in Algeria on November 9, 2011, after a severe cold wave.
